Trade/Device Name(s): Immage Immunochemistry Systems High Sensitivity Cardiac C-Reactive Protein (CCRP) Reagent
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immage Immunochemistry Systems High Sensitivity Cardiac C-Reactive Protein (CCRP) Reagent and Cal 5 Plus calibrator for quantitative determination of CRP in human serum or plasma using rate turbidimetry.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of C-Reactive Protein in human serum or plasma by rate turbidimetry; Cal 5 Plus is used for calibration of Anti-Streptolysin O, C-Reactive Protein, and Rheumatoid Factor on IMMAGE Immunochemistry Systems.
